General.Name: TDb Split Corp
General.Description: TDb Split Corp. is a closed-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Quadravest Capital Management Inc. It invests in the public equity markets of Canada. The fund seeks to invest in the stocks of a company operating in the banking sector. It primarily invests in the common shares of Toronto-Dominion Bank. The fund benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the S&P TSX Financial Index. TDb Split Corp. was formed on May 24, 2007 and is domiciled in Canada.
General.Address: 77 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1K7
